title: The Pride #2
description: The team is now formed! But when a literal trial by fire pops up, will they be ready? Moreover, will the world be ready? And just what is the villainous Reverend up to?The Pride #2 by Joe Glass, Gavin Mitchell, Kris Carter and Mike Stock, and two back-up stories drawn by Joe Glass and Cory Smith, featuring Angel and Muscle Mary!------------------------------------------------------------Written by Joe GlassArt by Gavin Mitchell, Joe Glass and Cory SmithCover by Cory Smith
author: Joe   Glass
